programme.title: The Diamond Trail
programme.desc: A New York reporter (Rex Bell) follows a gang of gem smugglers west.

programme.title: Son of the Renegade
programme.desc: A man (John Carpenter) takes over a ranch left by his outlaw father.

programme.title: Springtime in the Rockies
programme.desc: A ranch foreman tries to settle the dispute over grazing rights between his employer and angry cattlemen.

programme.title: Hellgate
programme.desc: After the Civil War, ranch owner Gil Hanley helps a stranger in desperate need of medical attention. Soon he is questioned by Union soldiers about the stranger, who turns out to be an ex-Confederate soldier.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney hunt a legendary golden wolf that roams the Colorado foothills.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: While in Wyoming to oversee a land deal, Pat and Stoney take care of a pair of twins.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: A pair of crooks plans to rob the Cannonball of its bank shipment.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer returns to Shady Rest in an attempt to scrap the Cannonball.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho hope to imprison the leader of a rustling ring.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A con man resorts to murder in a phony land promotion scheme.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Frankie befriends an outlaw after his gang robs the train.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: While investigating a train robbery, Matt Clark learns about Johnny Ringo; Frankie gets a job doing undercover work; Matt tracks Johnny down.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean
programme.desc: Sharon Bender's father is killed when her intentions to marry Adam over his objections are known.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean
programme.desc: Even though Judge Roy Bean temporarily loses his eyesight, he's still able to uncover a plot to steal Indian land.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) looks beyond local gossip to uncover a plot against a struggling family. With Stanley Andrews, Bill Henry.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) attempts to prove a beautiful woman (Eve Miller) is involved in two bank robberies. With Rick Vallin.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook find Wenatchgo, an old and respected medicine man, wandering in the forest; they discover that the elderly man has been driven out of the tribe by a younger and ambitious rival.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachgook find a young Irish girl, Bridget, alone in the woods; she is running away from a man named Stark who claims to own her.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Hoss and Little Joe spend a most unforgettable night at the carnival when Little Joe's date disappears.

programme.title: Bells of San Angelo
programme.desc: A writer (Dale Evans) of cowboy novels saves herself and a border agent (Roy Rogers) with a trick from her latest book.

programme.title: Colorado Sundown
programme.desc: Rex (Rex Allen) and Slim (Slim Pickens) journey to Colorado, where Slim is expecting to claim the estate of the departed Zeke Reynolds, but the will also includes Jacqueline Reynolds and the evil Hurley siblings, and a fight ensues.

programme.title: Captain Apache
programme.desc: A full-blooded Apache working for the U.S. Army investigates a colleague's murder and uncovers a plot by a wealthy white farmer to instigate an Indian war; gunplay and bloodshed follow as the investigation deepens.

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: A former gunslinger survives his own hanging and transforms himself into a mysterious avenger of injustice.

programme.title: Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: Two former Pony Express riders enter a dilapidated stagecoach in a race for a government mail contract.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: An ex-convict bandit (Marlon Brando) finds the partner (Karl Malden) who betrayed him is now a town sheriff with a wife (Katy Jurado) and daughter.

programme.title: Land of Hunted Men
programme.desc: The Range Busters (Ray Corrigan, Dennis Moore, Max Terhune) track outlaws to their hide-out.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A boy raised by his servant vows to take revenge on the ranchers who killed his parents.
